thread.title: Spain’s Finance Chief Set to Secure ECB’s No. 2 Post

author: Todd Buell
title: Spain’s Finance Chief Set to Secure ECB’s No. 2 Post
text:
BRUSSELS—Spain’s finance minister looks set to secure the No. 2 position at the European Central Bank after his only rival for the post withdrew, opening the door for something many Germans have long wanted: one of their countrymen leading the ECB.
Luis de Guindos was nominated Monday by eurozone finance ministers as the next ECB vice president after Ireland withdrew its nomination of Philip Lane, the governor of the Irish central bank.
